metaTitle: Direct from owner – no broker commission
metaDescription: On MyHome24App you can find listings offered directly by owners – without broker commission, with personal contact and flexible agreements.
title: Buy or rent directly from the owner
description: Direct-from-owner listings often provide more flexibility on price, move-in date and individual agreements. On MyHome24App you negotiate conditions directly with the owner.
imageAlt: House with for sale sign offered by the owner

highlight.label: No broker commission
highlight.text: Save on commission and negotiate all terms directly with the owner.

featuresLead: Talking directly to owners gives you more transparency, flexibility and authentic insights into the property.

features.title: No commission
features.text: Direct listings usually do not include a broker fee – this reduces your overall purchase or rental costs.

features.title: Personal contact
features.text: Clarify all questions directly with the owner – from the first viewing up to handing over the keys.

features.title: Flexible agreements
features.text: Move-in date, minor repairs or furniture can often be negotiated more flexibly when you speak directly to the owner.

features.title: Real insights
features.text: Owners know their property best and can share history, background and special features first-hand.

tipText: Use the filters in the search or map view to focus on “Direct from owner” listings. This way you immediately see all suitable properties in your preferred area.
readyText: Start your search for properties offered directly by owners and compare conditions at your own pace.

ownerCta.title: You are an owner yourself?
ownerCta.text: Publish your property on MyHome24App in just a few steps and reach interested buyers or tenants – transparent and without hidden fees.
